Question: Shenzhen C&D Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen C&D Electronics Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Leading global manufacturer of remote controls
- Specializes in wireless universal control solutions for smart home and home entertainment
- Offers smart light control, smart door control, smart window control, smart set-top box controller, various audio and video remote controls, mobile APP, Bluetooth, zigbee, and WiFi central control terminal products
- 409 national patents, including 24 invention patents, 286 utility model patents, 64 appearance patents, and 35 software copyrights
- ISO9001: 2008 quality management system and ISO14001: 2004 environmental management system certified
- Products comply with CE certification, FCC certification, and relevant EU environmental protection directives (WEEE&ROHS)
- Actively involved in domestic and international exchanges in the intelligent control industry and industry-university-research cooperation
- 80% of products sold to overseas markets, emphasizing win-win cooperation, value creation, and serving society

深圳C&D电子有限公司。

- 拥有409项国家专利，包括24项发明专利、286项实用新型专利、64项外观设计专利和35项软件著作权
- ISO9001: 2008质量管理体系和ISO14001: 2004环境管理体系认证
- 产品符合CE认证、FCC认证和相关欧盟环保指令（WEEE&ROHS）

- 80%的产品销往海外市场，强调双赢合作、价值创造和为社会服务
